title: Volvo Car India rejigs management team
description: Volvo Car India has restructured its management team under Jyoti Malhotra to secure long-term strategic transformation and direct-to-consumer online sales. Kalpit Shishodia has been promoted to director commercial operations, overseeing all revenue-generating functions under sales and service. Prashant Khanna has been elevated to director business transformation and retail development, leading the transformation of the company's retailers and implementing all-digital platforms for online-direct-to-consumer sales.
